@domangerer @NetlifySupport Yep! You can either use Deploy Notifications to call out to a webhook, or you can make a #serverless function to do whatever you need. Netlify Functions support naming conventions for triggering them automatically based on different events. https://t.co/occwxNHmHg https://t.co/bbSQYMt4xv
